data.content: Please generate the content for the top-level.yaml file for a pizzeria chatbot. This should be a menu-type module called top-level and function as the main entry point. Include a presentation field that welcomes the user and explains the chatbot's capabilities. Within the items, create three options: the first, an item of type answer that serves as a greeting or simple presentation; the second, an item of type module that links to a question and answer module (pizza_qa); and the third, another item of type module that starts the flow to place a pizza order, referencing a module called order_flow. Do not forget to add a fallback message for incomprehensible responses. Your answer should contain only the YAML code for this top-level.yaml file.

```yaml
# -----> File: top_level.yaml <-----
modules:
- name: top-level
  kind: menu
  presentation: |
    Welcome to our pizzeria chatbot! I'm here to assist you with ordering delicious pizzas and answering any questions you may have about our menu. How can I help you today?
  fallback: I'm sorry, I did not get what you said. Can you rephrase?

  items:
  - title: Greeting
    kind: answer
    answer: |
      Welcome to our pizzeria! I'm your chatbot assistant, ready to help you with your pizza orders and inquiries.
  - title: Pizza Q&A
    kind: module
    reference: pizza_qa
  - title: Start Pizza Order
    kind: module
    reference: order_flow
```
